snippet.title: BLACK SNOW Trailer
snippet.description:
TAKE THE ROLE OF JOHN MATSUDA,
the last surviving member of the Prometheus 1 crew responding to a distress signal from Amaluuk Station,
Greenland. He must find a way to escape the station while struggling against unknown malevolent forces.

BLACK SNOW have been in development since early 2012 and have finally managed to release! The mod will be related to the current indie game project the team is developing so stay tuned and let us know if you like it or not! 

But alas, enough talk - grab your gear and ready yourselves for a long and dark winter.

Download below for free!

http://www.desura.com/mods/black-snow
http://www.moddb.com/mods/black-snow
